questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of this upholstered furniture piece?

What seems to be the main material used for the sofa's visible covering?
Observing the legs, what color are they, based purely on visual evidence?
Judging by its construction, how many distinct seating sections does the sofa possess?
Describe the visual style of the armrests; are they plain or ornate?
What is the apparent design aesthetic of the sofa, modern or antique?
Considering the image, what is the apparent overall condition of the sofa?
What seems to be the material of the sofa's legs, wood or metal?
Does the upholstery appear to have a patterned design, or is it solid in visual appearance?
Describe the visual appearance of the cushions; are they plush or flat?
Observing the seams, are they visibly prominent or subtly incorporated?
